sentence.Network_en: The abettor of our country has tri - nature: independency, dependency and unique nature. Independency is leading.
sentence.Network_cn: 我国教唆犯的性质具有三重性,既具有独立性,又具有可罚程度上的从属性, 同时还具有自己独特的属性, 其中独立性居于主导地位.

sentence.Network_en: And it is inadvisable to criminate the abettor separately by the aspect of legislation and judicature.
sentence.Network_cn: 在个罪意义的立法和司法操作中也不宜于对教唆犯单独定罪.
